title: Online Course for Strengthening Science Teachers' Competencies Based on Australian Indigenous Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of science education and teacher preparation processes
context.additional_context: Designing science pedagogy and online learning environments reflecting cultural identity for Australian Indigenous learners

learning_goals: Design and implement at least three science education PBL projects reflecting Australian Indigenous culture.
Acquire the ability to facilitate learner-engaged online discussion sessions using narrative yarning techniques.
Develop and apply two types of online assessment tools considering cultural contexts.
Write a report analyzing the cultural needs of Indigenous learners on digital platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
